cars.name: Nissan GTR R35
cars.description: A modern legend in the world of performance, the Nissan GTR R35 delivers mind-blowing acceleration with its twin-turbo V6 and advanced AWD system. Known as 'Godzilla,' it combines raw power with cutting-edge tech and track-ready precision.

cars.name: Toyota Supra MK4
cars.description: The Toyota Supra MK4 is an iconic Japanese sports car, revered for its 2JZ-GTE engine and legendary tuning potential. With sleek curves and a reputation built by enthusiasts and pop culture alike, it's a dream car for collectors and speed junkies.

cars.name: Chevrolet Camaro ZL1
cars.description: Packing a supercharged V8 and aggressive styling, the Camaro ZL1 is an American muscle car beast. It delivers blistering speed, track-ready handling, and that unmistakable roar that turns heads on every street.

cars.name: Ford Mustang GT
cars.description: The Ford Mustang GT is a timeless muscle car icon, offering classic V8 power with modern performance upgrades. With bold looks and a deep growl, it's built for those who crave an authentic driving experience.

cars.name: BMW M3 E46
cars.description: The BMW M3 E46 blends refined German engineering with track-capable performance. Its naturally aspirated inline-6, rear-wheel drive, and sharp handling make it a favorite among driving purists and enthusiasts worldwide.
